Second I don’t think you know what it means to have that many writers for a song… Eminem writes the lyrics, and then 11 other people look over them and tweak things around, to maybe better fit the beat or have a better flow etc.
And luciano. GREEN DAY also write their songs
Also since when has Wikipedia been a reliable source... lol
Yes, I told you, if they tweak one word of a song they're credited as a writer.

Hey Vincent, look at the writers for Rap God. They're all writers included in the writing of the songs Eminem *REFERENCES* in Rap God. For example,  Dania Birks is listed as a writer, and she was in JJ Fad ("Lyrics comin at you at supersonic speed"). They must be listed as writers if they are referenced. Same goes with Berzerk, since some of the Beastie Boys are listed as writers too ("Just like I did with addiction I'm 'bout to kick it" <--kick it is the first line from Fight For Your Right to Party )
